humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'A, B. Lymph nodes, left axillary sentinel #1 & #2, excisions -. Negative for malignancy.' This means that the sentinel lymph nodes do not have any metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the new rule 10 and rule 8, the N stage is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the left axillary sentinel lymph nodes (specimens A and B) were negative for malignancy. Additionally, the surgical specimen from the breast (specimen C) did not have ductal carcinoma in situ or vessel invasion identified. The closest margin was 1.5 mm from the posterior aspect of the breast specimen, but a separately submitted new posterior margin (specimen D) was negative for malignancy. Therefore, based on the information provided, the patient's pathologic N stage is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
